hadiths.text: Asma' reported Allah's Messenger (way peace be upon him) as saying (to her):Spend and do not calculate, (for) Allah would calculate in your case; and do not hoard, otherwise Allah would be withholding from you

chapter.ara-name: باب الْحَثِّ فِي الإِنْفَاقِ وَكَرَاهَةِ الإِحْصَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: Encouragement to spend, and it is disliked to count how much
